label: Footwear
description: Market category for various types of shoes and sandals.

subcategories.label: Sneakers
subcategories.description: Casual athletic shoes for everyday wear.

subcategories.label: Espadrilles
subcategories.description: Lightweight shoes with a woven sole and canvas or cotton upper.

subcategories.label: Loafers
subcategories.description: Slip-on shoes with a low heel and no laces.

subcategories.label: Sandals
subcategories.description: Open-toed shoes with straps or a thong between the toes.

subcategories.label: Boat shoes
subcategories.description: Casual leather shoes with laces and a rubber sole.

subcategories.label: Clogs
subcategories.description: Comfortable shoes with a wooden or rubber sole and an open back.

subcategories.label: Flip flops
subcategories.description: Casual sandals with a flat sole and a thong between the toes.
